page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: The{1981 census}indicated that 80% of houses in Warmsworth were owner occupied and 20% were council rented.Two purpose built disabled persons bungalows are owned by the council in the area.During last year no new building was carried out in the council sector and the number of houses in Warmsworth makes a total of 1440.The average cost of a council house is between{Â£22,500}and{Â£26,000 and the rate and rent charge depends on the type of accommodation. Complaints to the council vary but tenants report defects to their properties which are subsequently repaired or may enquire about a rebate. From first being on site ,a contractor could build a house in 10 to 15 weeks. (continued on page 19)
